property.name: WaterVolume

property.name: Destructive
property.documentation: If this zone kills most of the actors instantly.

property.name: DamagePerSec

property.name: NoInventory
property.documentation: If the inventory is allowed here.

property.documentation: If this velocity zone should impart velocity to projectiles and effects.

property.documentation: Players can't take damage in this zone.
